name: 荒野酷跑
description:
Cool 3D vertical version of Parkour game shock struck!

Run, jump, glide, turn, escape dangerous days in dangerous cliffs, canoes, rivers, mines and forests!

Turn over the fence, climb the cliffs, measure your reaction. Swipe and bend, jump, slide over obstacles, collect coins, buy energy and see how far you can run!

Explore the unknown world, in the face of extreme unknown fear! ! !

Waiting for them, is an endless treasure, or buried in the ground?
